The movie tells the story of a young boy named Paddy who is captured by German soldiers during World War II. He ends up being treated like a pet by his captors until he manages to escape from their grasp by climbing onto one of the German soldiers' horses.
I would also recommend the movie 'Thir13en Ghosts'. It stars F Murray Abraham, Shannon Elizabeth, and the late Meryl Streep. The movie tells the story of three ghosts who are haunting the house where they died in World War I. The ghosts each have their own unique personality traits, including being mean-spirited, sensitive to criticism, and having a tendency towards acting impulsively.
